properties.comment: Game mode description language file - Default English
properties.entry: Standard game mode for beginners.
Standard game mode for Various Players. Goal for the "Bonus level"!
How long can you survive against the rising garbage lines?
Try to empty "GOAL" counter as fast as you can.
Gameplay is similar to Marathon mode, but it's Much Faster!
Clear certain number of lines as fast as possible.
Get certain number of points as fast as possible.
Clear all garbage lines as fast as possible.
Try to clear all the lines in the well in one combo.
Score as many points as possible within the time limit.
Create 4x4 squares to get more points.
A classic game that takes you to the nostalgic feeling.
A game based on the classics where efficiency is important.
A classic game that many Japanese players played like a monkey.
Modern Arranged RETRO MANIA. What's waiting beyond the level 15...?
Try to score many Points and Fireworks as possible, within level 300.
Erase all gem blocks from the playfield within the time limit.
Try to score many Points for the better grade, until reach level 999.
Grade base is different, and Speed increasing will keep after level 500.
Each Level Intensity will Varies Greatly by Your Skill!
Watch out for rising garbage blocks.
Complete Levels by each 10 lines, before runs out the time limit.
Play High speed Throughout. and Can you break the level 500 barrier?
Much Faster With Insane Gimmicks. This won't ends at level 999 as usual!
This has some speed, and the playfield is gonna invisible!
Only for players who have INFINITY Brain Power. Good luck!
You can practice various speed settings in this mode.
This is a tool for creating maps for VS-BATTLE mode and NetPlay mode.
Battle against human or AI opponent.
Clear certain number of lines before your opponent.
Clear all garbage lines before your opponent.
Connect 4 or more same color blocks to clear them.
Premade chains will drop down endlessly.
Clear chains to send your opponent garbage.
Use premade chains to attack your opponent.
Dig down to the flashing gem before your opponent.
Clear chains to send bombs.
Clear chains to send patterned garbages.
Clear gem blocks by lining up blocks of the same color.
Clear all gem blocks before your opponent.
Use gems to clear blocks of the same color.
You can access more game modes from here.
This folder contains all available game modes.
This folder contains the Recommended modes.
Standard modes Based by TTC Guidelines. Have fun!
Nostalgia modes. Let's Enjoy the Near-Original!
Simple Race modes. Try your best in the short time!
Grade Recognizing modes. Challenge to be a GrandMaster!
Not-Categorizable variety modes.
Connect 4 or more same color blocks to clear them.
Clear gem blocks by lining up blocks of the same color.
Use gems to clear blocks of the same color.
